entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Attawapiskat Airport 11:47 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure: 98.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: NE 41 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
